project.name: C-C400B-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C400B-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

scoring_formula.formula: (STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT) AND log_file_hashes_5yhxIfSb4k

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

iopair.name: C-C400B-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="/dev/urandom" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_SMxWA7R5bsWvPQsTB3Yd AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_Wn5ESZr0g8)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_Wn5ESZr0g8) OR controlled_exit_Sui32qWO9u)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_Wn5ESZr0g8)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_Wn5ESZr0g8) OR controlled_exit_Sui32qWO9u))
